Flub.Name: Precipitation
Flub.Description: The amount of rainfall that should occur in the precipitation simulation.

Flub.Name: Small Lakes
Flub.Description: Favor or discourage smaller lake bodies. Allowing smaller lakes can be useful for creating swampy environments or puddles.

Flub.Name: Flood Control
Flub.Description: Flood the terrain with a minimum amount of water, in addition to the Precipitation.

Flub.Name: Water Floor
Flub.Description: The altitude to which water is flooded with Flood Control. You can enter a precise height such as `500m` by right-clicking.

Flub.Name: Shore Size
Flub.Description: The size of the shore surrounding all water bodies created by the node.

Flub.Name: Altitude Bias
Flub.Description: Bias the altitude of the shoreline.

Flub.Name: Size Bias
Flub.Description: Bias the size of the shoreline.
